exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce m to an evaluable reference.

In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid t : nat m : seq nat pt : nat_eqType r : nat ps : PState lg : Log H : Protocols.coh tpc d H0 : pt \\in pts H1 : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := cn; to := pt; active := internal_msg t cn pt |} H4 : Inv d Unable to unify "Inv d" with "is_true (p_matches_tag ps t)".

In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid t : nat m : seq nat pt : nat_eqType r : nat ps : PState lg : Log H : Protocols.coh tpc d H0 : pt \\in pts H1 : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := cn; to := pt; active := internal_msg t cn pt |} H4 : Inv d Unable to unify "find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := cn; to := pt; active := internal_msg t cn pt |}" with "is_true (p_matches_tag ps t)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
i: Ordered.sort mid
t: nat
m: seq nat
pt: Equality.sort nat_eqType
r: nat
ps: PState
lg: Log

Goal:
coh d -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> internal_msg t cn pt -> pt_state d (r, ps) lg pt -> Inv d -> p_matches_tag ps t

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
p_matches_tag = fun (s : PState) (mtag : nat_eqType) => match s with | PInit => mtag == prep_req | PRespondedYes _ => (mtag == commit_req) || (mtag == abort_req) | PRespondedNo _ => mtag == abort_req | _ => false end : PState -> nat_eqType -> bool
Inv = fun d : dstatelet => exists (round : nat) (l : Log), [\/ EverythingInit d round l, exists next_data : data, PhaseOne d round next_data l | exists next_data : data, PhaseTwo d round next_data l] : dstatelet -> Prop
Notation seq := list
internal_msg = fun (tag : nat) (from to : nid) => coord_msg tag from to || participant_msg tag from to : nat -> nid -> nid -> bool Arguments internal_msg _%nat_scope
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
from : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
to : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
nid = nat : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pt_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (p : PStateT) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => loc pt d = st :-> p \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> PStateT -> Log -> nid -> Prop
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
Inductive PState : Set := PInit : PState | PGotRequest : data -> PState | PRespondedYes : data -> PState | PRespondedNo : data -> PState | PCommitted : data -> PState | PAborted : data -> PState
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
PhaseTwoAbort_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
PhaseTwoCommit_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
commit_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg
abort_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg
prep_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = prep_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg
inv_msg_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : coh d) (i : mid) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from to round : nat) (cs : CState), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> internal_msg tag from to -> Inv d -> getStC C = (round, cs) -> head 0 m == round
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
prep_no_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_no -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_yes_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_yes -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)]
pt_InitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
abort_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = abort_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
rc_step_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : coh d) (this : nat_eqType) (Hthis : this \in nodes cn pts others) (tag : nat) (from : nid) (m : seq nat) (i : mid), ~~ internal_msg tag from this -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> rc_step tag from m C Hthis = loc this d
rp_step_external : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : coh d) (this : nat_eqType) (Hthis : this \in nodes cn pts others) (tag : nat) (from : nid) (m : seq nat) (i : mid), ~~ internal_msg tag from this -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> rp_step Hnin tag from m C Hthis = loc this d
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
abort_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
E_consume_external = fun (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (P : dstatelet -> Type) => coh d -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> ~~ internal_msg tag from this -> P d -> P {| dstate := upd this (loc this d) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} : dstatelet -> mid -> nat_ordType -> nat -> seq nat -> nat -> (dstatelet -> Type) -> Type Arguments E_consume_external _ _ _ _%nat_scope _%seq_scope _%nat_scope _%function_scope
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
commit_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
no_msg_from_to' = fun (from to : nat) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> ~~ criterion t c : nat -> nat -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to' (_ _)%nat_scope _%function_scope
cn_PhaseOneReceive_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), cn_PhaseOneReceive d round next_data lg recvd -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := cn; active := true |} -> from \in pts -> from \in [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] -> coh d -> cn_PhaseOneReceive {| dstate := upd cn (mkLocal (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd, lg)) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} round next_data lg recvd
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
msg_spec_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (from to tg : nat) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (cnt' : seq nat) (i : mid), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt' |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> (pt != from) || (to != to') -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
PhaseOne_PGotRequest_next_data_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt_state d (r, PGotRequest nd) lg pt -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
PhaseTwo_PCommitted_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (Hpt : pt \in nodes cn pts others), pt \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hpt = (r, PCommitted nd) -> PhaseTwo d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
PhaseTwo_PAborted_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (Hpt : pt \in nodes cn pts others), pt \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hpt = (r, PAborted nd) -> PhaseTwo d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
PhaseOne_round_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), pt \in pts -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
getStP_K : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP Hnin C pf = m

original: intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. unfold coh in H. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. unfold pt_state in H1. destruct H3. unfold find in H0. unfold find in H0. unfold is_true in H. unfold tag in H2. unfold m in H2. unfold from in H2. unfold to in H2. unfold active in H2. simpl in H2. destruct H2. rewrite <- H1. apply (H0 i). apply H2. apply H3. apply H4. apply H1. apply H5. apply H6. apply H7. apply H8.
